00031 #include "spiceweasel.h"
00032 
00033 /* temporary data */
00034 
00035 TFrame orig_frame;
00036 TFrame gamma_frame;
00037 TFrame average_frame;
00038 TFrame diffed_frame;
00039 TFrame despeckle_frame;
00040 TFrame sharp_frame;
00041 
00042 void process_init()
00043 {
00044   orig_frame.allocated = 0;
00045   gamma_frame.allocated = 0;
00046   average_frame.allocated = 0;
00047   diffed_frame.allocated = 0;
00048   despeckle_frame.allocated = 0;
00049   sharp_frame.allocated = 0;
00050 }
00051 
00052 int process_frames(TFrame **framebuffer, int nframes, int centreframe, TFrame *output)
00053 {
00054 
00055   /************ BACKGROUND SUBTRACTION ***************/
00056 
00057   /* Compute minimum frame (only of 256 left columns) */
00058   minimum_frames(framebuffer, nframes, &average_frame, 10000000);
00059 
00060   //despeckle_median(&average_frame, &diffed_frame, 1);
00061 
00062   /* Subtract from centre frame */
00063   subtract_background(framebuffer[centreframe], &average_frame, &diffed_frame);
00064 
00065   /* Normalize/Amplify the frame */
00066   //normalize_frame(&diffed_frame, &diffed_frame);
00067   amplify_frame(&diffed_frame, &diffed_frame, 4.0);
00068 
00069   /* Gamma correct differenced frame (enhance low intensity) */
00070   gamma_correct_frame(&diffed_frame, &diffed_frame, 2.0);
00071   
00072   /* Despeckle the differenced frame */
00073   //despeckle_median(&diffed_frame, &despeckle_frame, 1);
00074   
00075   gauss_blur(&diffed_frame, &despeckle_frame, 3.0);
00076   
00077   /* Sharpen despeckled frame */
00078   //sharpen_simple(&despeckle_frame, &sharp_frame, 0.4);
00079   //sharpen_unsharp(&despeckle_frame, &sharp_frame, 4.0, 1.0);
00080 
00081   /************** ENHANCE ORIGINAL *********************/
00082 
00083   /* Amplify original frame - keep for output */
00084   amplify_frame(framebuffer[centreframe], &orig_frame, 2.0);
00085 
00086   /* Gamma enhance */
00087   gamma_correct_frame(&orig_frame, &gamma_frame, 1.5);
00088 
00089   /* Despeckle */
00090   //despeckle_median(&gamma_frame, &despeckle_frame, 1);
00091 
00092   //kuwahara_filter(&orig_frame, &despeckle_frame, 2);
00093 
00094   /* Sharpen */
00095   //sharpen_unsharp(&despeckle_frame, &gamma_frame, 4.0, 1.2);
00096   
00097 
00098   /************** CONCATENATE FRAMES *******************/
00099 
00100   concatenate_frames(output, 3, &gamma_frame,
00101                      &diffed_frame, &despeckle_frame);
00102 
00103   output->number = framebuffer[centreframe]->number;
00104 
00105   return(0);
00106 }
